thread.title: VERBATIM: U.S. plans new Russia sanctions for Syria chemical attack

title: VERBATIM: U.S. plans new Russia sanctions for Syria chemical attack
text:
VERBATIM: U.S. plans new Russia sanctions for Syria chemical attack 6:10pm BST - 01:10 
U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations Nikki Haley on Sunday said the Trump administration is readying new sanctions on Moscow to punish Russia for protecting its ally Syria after reports Syrian government forces used chemical weapons against civilians in that country's bloody civil war.   Ambassador to the United Nations Nikki Haley on Sunday said the Trump administration is readying new sanctions on Moscow to punish Russia for protecting its ally Syria after reports Syrian government forces used chemical weapons against civilians in that country's bloody civil war.  //reut.rs/2JOZ1Pu
